title: Forest: Focus For Productivity
description: Forest is an app that helps you stay focused on your work. When you want to focus, you plant a seed. Over time, while you focus, this seed will gradually grow into a tree. If you leave the app, your tree will die. This gamified approach leverages the Pomodoro Technique to make deep work more engaging. Users can collectively grow a virtual forest, reinforcing the community aspect of productivity.

title: SmPlan: ToDo List with Reminder
description: SmPlan is a minimal yet powerful task manager. It allows for quick task entry, intelligent reminder scheduling, and project grouping. The clean interface eliminates distractions, focusing solely on getting things done. The app syncs across all devices, ensuring your to-do list is always up-to-date, whether you are on desktop or mobile. It also includes location-based reminders.
